sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../index.scss"; const AllRecepies = ({Recepies }) => { console.log(Recepies) return (
{Recepies.map((recepie)=>{ return (<>
<>

{recepie.recepie_Name}

{recepie.Cook_Time+recepie.Prep_Time}:Mins
{ recepie.Serves }
{/*
<>

Pasta

30 Mins
Serves : 4
<>

Curry chicken

45 Mins
Serves : 4
<>

Stir-Fry

40 Mins
Serves : 3
<>

Roasted Chicken

425 Mins
Serves : 6
<>

Beef Stir Fry

40 Mins
Serves : 2
*/} ) })}
); }; export default AllRecepies;
